name: Simunaut
description:
Guide the Simunaut out of the area by activating four alien lotus plants which will open the hatch. Beware of the clone Simunauts...

A maze puzzler created for the 72-hour Mini Jam 103: Darkness game jam. The theme for the jam was 'darkness' with the limitation 'you are your own enemy'. This game requires you to activate 4 lotus plants to unlock the escape hatch. The limitation was executed by  spawning a clone of the player each time a lotus is activated. The clones mimic the movements of the player absolutely, and will destroy the player on contact.

This game features an original soundtrack I created for the project, as well as the amazing sprite animations of @rumblecade here on itch.io
